TopicTitle: Nice animation about the Rosetta Mission

Articles.Content:
Hey,

just found this nice little video of the upcoming wake up call for the Rosetta satellite and want to share it with you guys.

Once Upon A Time

An wonderful way to celebrate spaceflight and get the "regular people" out there interested in it as well.

Hop you enjoy it!
Nice! never even knew of the Rosetta Mission...

A lovely reminder on how the exploration of space can turn even a box of wires and solar cells into a hero. Enjoy the last few weeks of rest, Rosetta, both you and the people back on Earth have a lot of stuff to do. :-)

A lovely reminder on how the exploration of space can turn even a box of wires and solar cells into a hero.

It is actually funny how science missions can be more succesful by playing on animistic feelings for machinery, the very opposite of science.
